title: WTF is with all the chinese
body: Every game is infested with chinese now, i play with 2 mates, the other 2 for the last few weeks have almost always been chinese, right now the game im in 2 are chinese and the 2 before this game, and the game right now 4 of the enemy are chinese and the poor shaco cant do anything, they are speaking broken english trolling him and taking all his jungle

replies.body: I am in agreement with you, not just league of legends but most games that support an oceanic server seem to have chinese players flock to them for some reason they are typically very difficult to get along with and they grief 90% of the time. They are a blight on OCE servers.

> [{quoted}](name=Proteus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ziUP2Rp5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-17T11:35:11.956+0000)
>
> I am in agreement with you, not just league of legends but most games that support an oceanic server seem to have chinese players flock to them for some reason they are typically very difficult to get along with and they grief 90% of the time. They are a blight on OCE servers.

i don't think this is limited to OCE servers only. I mean there are so many Chinese people in this world that there is no countries in this world that doesn't have Chinese people living in it. in fact i am chinese too. Well the difference in culture could be why you find them hard to get along. If it gets too serious in game just mute them.
You clearly dont understand, they dont speak much if any english and do nothing but either troll, feed, fail or be racist, i never used to hate them but after the last few weeks i do now

well, jst gotta calm urself down mate. I never used to hate australians but when i moved into OCE, i do now. I played in NA, CN and OCE server and i gotta tell u mate. The community in CN server(which the chinese players themselves would complain its the most terrible community across the globe) is even better than OCE. The skill level is huge, CN d5 = oce d1, and from what ive seen the chinese players will flame somtimes,but they will actually try win the game and mute others to concentrate.
and btw i dont hate australians im jst making a point by using ur quote

i think we should point out its not the chinese/koreans/etc that are annoying, its anyone that doesnt speak english, doesnt play properly, doesnt ping or respond to them, doesnt ward, and they're just in their own world. but who cares about any of this, we all know this is of riots least concern. highest being how can we maximise efficiency of the amount of skins and chroma packs we pump out every patch

Yeah, Riot should do something to these no communication behaviour, when they actually ping it just spam 'defence inhip' when the whole team is dead, and start blaming team that team feed and he is the only one alive, because he run away the moment we engage in team fight so he could keep his kda.

No i dont agree. I have had great games with people who only ping. Not necessarily speaking at all let alone not speaking english. Its the trend of these chinese players that just fight and feed all game then start trolling in the broken english. Basically they all go balls deep at lvl 2 with ignight. And just fight opposition champ with no interest in any other aspect of the game. 1v1 1v5 they dont care they just fight
True super toxic {{champion:112}}  and {{champion:98}} ruined game.
Agreed, I've met one chinese that was above plat and didn't troll. Other than that, 99% of the chinese I've met are fkn shit trolls
Its not just league either, Ark has been invaded too and they turn everything to crap
They're pissing me off with Agar.io.. They fucking team up in ffa
Give yourself a random Vietnamese/Chinese/whatever name and pretend you're one of them.

I wouldn't mind a comment from a rioter if they know about this and if they know why, i mean its not that its Chinese Australians, these are people who dont speak much if any English and some seem to not know its the oce server as they asked if we were Japanese or Vietnamese

> [{quoted}](name=Scipio,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ziUP2Rp5,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-18T09:47:57.206+0000)
>
> I wouldn't mind a comment from a rioter if they know about this and if they know why, i mean its not that its Chinese Australians, these are people who dont speak much if any English and some seem to not know its the oce server as they asked if we were Japanese or Vietnamese

you're not gonna get a comment from a rioter. they want nothing to do with people like you.
Want knowing...so you are one of them too then

> [{quoted}](name=Scipio,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ziUP2Rp5,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-08-11T13:31:09.893+0000)
>
> Want knowing...so you are one of them too then

lmao typed something different and deleted the wrong word.
nice judgement based on a single thing though dickwad.
Is that you pauline?

Just been with one, he keep trolling team by not joining team fight and blame team with his broken English and  say thing like "if you no attack Jinx we lose"  when he was the only one that never go after Jinx and refuse to attack the nexux when he was the only one left and it only take 1 hit to finish it off, so we lose the game when enemy team got ace and this Chinese Ekko threaten to report team and call us all a troll. We cant report him either since  he only say thing like "Sej u bad" and some Chinese letters(which I cant read), so mad losing rank because of some idiot.

What if they're not Chinese and just from any non English country like Malaysia or India? I never meet Chinese people who troll. In fact, most of the trolls I meet say m8 way too much, if that means anything.
When they type its either the big squares or its pinyin and when they flame its always the same, homophobic slurs

u do realized the big square doesnt necessraily has to be chinese? any other language that is not English are not recognizable in the lol client,lets say korean or japanese characters,they will be automatically turned into squares as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Dengpao,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ziUP2Rp5,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-09-19T15:40:05.066+0000)
>
> u do realized the big square doesnt necessraily has to be chinese? any other language that is not English are not recognizable in the lol client,lets say korean or japanese characters,they will be automatically turned into squares as well.

Yeah but,

http://fcdn.mtbr.com/attachments/downhill-freeride/704128d1359601749t-new-school-gravity-bikes-thread-necromancy-thread-necromancy-demotivational-poster-1271554886.jpg

No need to revive a stupid thread that is clearly infested with xenophobia to some extent.
Another game, me and 1 mate 3 chinese on my team and 4 on the enemy team, whats going on with this server, its the same on Ark survival evolved
try play ranked,i guarantee you 80% of the feeders/ragers or afks are australians/new zealanders. Look at the top 200 challengere ladder,almost half of them are chinese lol.

This is the oce server, so there will be lots of aussie feeders becuase of skill levels, but EVERY chinese person(they speak in pinyin mostly) are terrible and only speak english to use homophobic and racist slurs
Hu chong chong

that actually has no real meaning.

胡崇崇 - Hu chong chong

Legit translates into Hu chong chong.
I don't think they're chinese based in China. I personally live in China and I haven't played for 2 seasons due to being unable to log in. All my friends have the same problem

Well they dont speak english unless its to flame people otherwise its just either the blank sqaure text thing or its all pinyin, just played 2 more games, both games the 2 random players(not my mates) were chinese and at least 1 on the enemy team was too, this has to stop, its making the game unplayable as they almost always feed and refuse to work as a team and if they do speak its just flaming, mostly homophobic comments
Ni hên bù hâo

你好

我叫爪

对不起，我的中文不好


心爪是很好，他是非常凶
